alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 8:52PM PST until December 24 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches with locally heavier amounts on the Camas prairie. Additionally there could be light ice accumulations that develop overnight due to freezing rain. Pockets of freezing rain lasting into early hours Saturday. * WHERE...Nezperce, Winchester, Culdesac, Peck, Kamiah, Alpowa Summit, Pomeroy, Gifford, Lapwai, Clarkston, Craigmont, Lewiston Grade, Lewiston, and Soldiers Meadow Road. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
